title: Jennifer Lawrence, Aniston, and Lopez All Live In These 3 Basic Shoes
text:
While there are many celebrities who inspire our wardrobes, there are three women we turn to the most for style inspiration. And believe it or not, they’re all named Jennifer. Yep, Jennifer Lawrence, Jennifer Aniston, and Jennifer Lopez just seem to get it. While each of the ladies have very distinct personal styles, there’s quite a bit of crossover in terms of the basics they wear to complete their perfect outfits—especially in the shoe department.

On that note, we scrolled through a range of recent imagery and identified three common shoe silhouettes the Jens consistently wear. And fun fact, they’re essentially staple styles we all have in our wardrobes. (Yep, stars really are just like us.) With that in mind, keep scrolling to check out the footwear styles in question, and shop our favorite iterations of each if you’re looking to add to your shoe closet.

View photos

Black ankle boots with white trousers and a slouchy blazer feels incredibly modern for the season.

On Jennifer Aniston: Chanel bag

View photos

What’s more timeless than a white T-shirt, skinny jean, and bootie ensemble? Exactly.

On Jennifer Lawrence: Dior sunglasses; Alexander Wang fanny pack

View photos

Keep it polished by wearing black boots with a white blouse and smart tailoring.

On Jennifer Lopez: Monika booties
